Welcome to the website of

Bartosz Hajduk Law Firm

more detailed

My activity

Effective and professional legal service for my clients is the most important priority for me

My office is always open to new and old customers, including foreign ones. The company provides comprehensive support for entrepreneurs, which is also the case on the ordering of the individual person looking for reliable and immediate legal assistance. The office is also guided by cooperation and services for entities outside Poland.

The mission of the Company is to provide reliable advice and assistance to the client, staying in close and frequent contact with him, based on full trust and a sense of reliability.

learn more

My legal practice

The company's specialization is to conduct all types of legal proceedings (litigation and non-litigious proceedings), both for entrepreneurs and for individuals, including claims in law enforcement.

Who am I?

Bartosz Hajduk

Attorney at law

Education:

The Faculty of Law at the Adam Mickevich University in Poznan, graduated in 2001.

International study program master of business administration "MBA Poznan – Atlanta" at the University of Economics in Poznan, graduated in 2003.

Attorney at law specialization done at the District Attorney at Law Chaber in Poznan, qualified attorney at law since 11th of February 2010.

Legal practice is awarded in several law firms. I have 18 years of experience in practical areas of law

Foreign languages:

German : certificate in German ZMP. Fluent level of communication, extensive experience in documentation and document management on German

English : fluent level of communication
